entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
